title: Casino Critique
author: Casino Critique
content: We need to grow our social handles. Ideally Twitter, Telegram, Discord, Facebook LinkedIn, Reddit and other social media channels.Since the site has not launched yet, we are not able to post regular updated but we need to keep engaging with the audience and build a community around. With the platform launch or without the launch, we need people who are active in our social channels. We don't want one single user to handle more than one of our social channels, it become difficult and they tends to make similar posts all over. Since there are not much audience in any of our social channels, we will focus on Twitter community right now. You will drive traffic from twitter to mainly to our Discord and Telegram channels.You will Tweet regularly targeting different hashtags and engage on Twitter conversations so that we are able to build a brand around Twitter. It's the same way we do on the forum. On the forum there are user who themselves are brand.  With our Twitter we want to do the same.The candidate will get access via TweetDeck and your job will be active on our Twitter. Make few creative tweets on your work days including image and hashtag, Engage with Twitter audience. Regularly follow targeted Twitter handles related to 1. Crypto Casinos2. Crypto Exchanges3. Crypto Influencers4. Crypto news agencies and anything related to crypto with having large community.We are not looking for follow, follow back audience but totally organic methods to brand our business.We have two slots to work. 10AM to 1PM and 1PM to 5PM UTC time Monday To Friday. Reply with your Telegram handle and the slot you are interested to work. Anyone familiar with canva and can create simple twitter images using canva will have some advantage to this work.

My telegram id is mentioned on my profile for reference I am posting my telegram id here too. My telegram Id is: t.me/shasan32

comments.body: My telegram ID is @Detritusz (https://t.me/Detritusz), I would love to handle the Facebook and telegram slot. 1pm to 5pm is okey by me.

comments.body: Id - cytpowayI have good knowledge of Canva and would have no problem handling facebook, or twitter or reddit1-5 pm is good

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: Hi. I am available from 10AM to 1PM.@YearsRunning

comments.author: Cryptolove20015
comments.body: Hello,i am interested. Please contact: TG_ https://t.me/khan_bt

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: Casino Critique on October 06, 2022, 04:40:06 PMWe need to grow our social handles. Ideally Twitter, Telegram, Discord, Facebook LinkedIn, Reddit and other social media channels.I'm just curious about your project because I can't figure out what it's all about, and you've been on presale for about 3 months with only 0.05btc ($99) raised so far. It doesn't appear to have any potential or interest in the community, but that's none of my business. My only concern is how you plan to pay for this position, which costs around $100 per week (at least that's my base rate), when the project only has 0.05btc capital.Paying in chips? Shouldn't be an option since it's worthless

comments.author: Casino Critique
comments.body: Quote from: igehhh on October 07, 2022, 08:45:08 AMPaying in chips? Shouldn't be an option since it's worthless We are offing a percent of partnership to be with us. It's already in discussion with a potential candidate. If works then we will lock this thread.
